item.title: Man held after five people attacked in hospital
item.description: Five people are treated by paramedics after they were assaulted in a hospital in Merseyside.

item.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, granddaughter of John F Kennedy, dies aged 35
item.description: She shared her diagnosis in a widely read essay last month, writing that she had less than a year to live.

item.title: George Clooney, wife Amal and their twins awarded French citizenship
item.description: The Hollywood actor and his wife, Amal, purchased their home in the south of France in 2021.

item.title: Mum and children who died in Boxing Day fire named
item.description: Fionnghuala Shearman and her daughter Eve and son Ohner died in the house fire on Boxing Day.

item.title: Family home devastated after toy catches fire on Christmas Day
item.description: A mother says her two children are traumatised and warns of the dangers of rechargeable batteries.
